DocAttribute.Name: EdgeElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Edge entity used to construct this oriented edge.

DocAttribute.Name: Orientation
DocAttribute.Documentation: BOOLEAN, If TRUE the topological orientation as used coincides with the orientation from start vertex to end vertex of the edge element. If FALSE otherwise.

DocAttribute.Name: EdgeStart
DocAttribute.Documentation: The start vertex of the oriented edge. It derives from the vertices of the edge element after taking account of the orientation.

DocAttribute.Name: EdgeEnd
DocAttribute.Documentation: The end vertex of the oriented edge. It derives from the vertices of the edge element after taking account of the orientation.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The edge element shall not be an oriented edge.
